T02D3773:175b-1: ma h'a ba lim karma kra mi bratti /
T02D3773:175b-3: gtor ma chen po'i las kyi rim pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D3773:175b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3773:175b-5: dngos po kun bdag rdo rje sems //
T02D3773:175b-6: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba //
T02D3773:175b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid che /
T02D3773:175b-8: rgyud bdag mgon por phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3773:175b-9: 'jam dbyangs la sogs thams cad la //
T02D3773:175b-10: rdo rje gus par phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3773:175b-11: gtor ma chen po'i rim pa 'di //
T02D3773:175b-12: blo dman rnams la phan phyir bshad //
T02D3773:175b-13: nyan pa po rtog pa dad ldan pa rnams dgos
T02D3773:175b-14: pa la sogs pa med pa la mi 'jug pas
T02D3773:175b-15: dang po re zhig dgos pa la sogs pa brjod
T02D3773:175b-16: par bya ste / de la dgos pa ni gtor
T02D3773:175b-17: ma chen po'i las kyi rim pa shes par bya'o
T02D3773:175b-18: par bya ste / // des bdag dang gzhan gyi
T02D3773:175b-19: don phun sum tshogs pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o
T02D3773:175b-20: par bya ste / // // de yang slob dpon gyi gzhung 'dis rtogs pa 'brel pa'o //
T02D3773:175b-21: brjod bya las kyi rim pa nyid do //
T02D3773:175b-22: shes rab ye shes 'od ldan pa //
T02D3773:175b-23: yan lag thams cad bsdus pa yi //
T02D3773:175b-25: ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyis yi dam gyis yi dam gyi lha la mchod pa byas pa'o //
T02D3773:175b-26: de yang shes rab ni stong pa nyid kyi ye
T02D3773:175b-27: shes kyi rang bzhin yum shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3773:175b-29: shes rab spros dang bral ba'o//
T02D3773:175b-31: stong pa nyid ni shes rab brjod //
T02D3773:175b-33: ye shes ni rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D3773:175b-34: shes rab ye shes 'od gsal ba yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D3773:175b-35: yan lag ni mtshan dang dpe byad de bsdus pa ni tshang ba'o //
T02D3773:175b-36: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
T02D3773:175b-38: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang gzungs dang ting 'dzin dang //
T02D3773:175b-39: so so yang dag rig dang bsrung ba med pa dang /
T02D3773:175b-40: sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'od ldan pas /
T02D3773:175b-41: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i yon tan khyad par kun ldan pa'o //
T02D3773:175b-42: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yan lag go //
T02D3773:175b-43: ma lus par tshang shing rdzogs pas na thams cad 'dus pa ste shing rta'i yan lag bzhin no //
T02D3773:175b-44: sdig pa rnams las ring du song bas 'phags pa'o //
T02D3773:176a-0: 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang ldan pas 'jam dpal @176a * //
T02D3773:176a-2: / sra zhing rtsub pa med pa'i dpal mnga' bas
T02D3773:176a-3: bgres shing 'gyur ba med pa'i sku na tshod lo
T02D3773:176a-4: brgyad pa lta bu gnyis su med pa'i bde ba'o
T02D3773:176a-5: // yang na shes rab ni spros pa dang bral ba stong pa nyid ye nas gnas pa'o //
T02D3773:176a-6: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung
T02D3773:176a-7: ma byung yang rung chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni
T02D3773:176a-8: gnas pa nyid do zhes pa dang /
T02D3773:176a-9: sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po can zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3773:176a-10: de gsal zhing rtogs pas shes rab ye shes 'od ldan no //
T02D3773:176a-11: shes rab ye shes nyid yan lag ste /
T02D3773:176a-12: bsdus pa'i sgra bsres pa la yang 'jug pas dbyer med do //
T02D3773:176a-13: de nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste /
T02D3773:176a-14: 'khor ba'i nyes pa bral ba gzugs skus 'gro ba'i don rdzogs pa /
T02D3773:176a-15: chos sku bde ba zag pa med pa la phyag 'tshal bas na btud pa'o //
T02D3773:176a-16: gzhung rdzogs pa dang le lo med par bya bas na //
T02D3773:176a-17: gtor ma bdag gis brtsams zhes pa ste rdzas mang
T02D3773:176a-18: pos bsres pa la mi 'dzin pas gtor ma ste
T02D3773:176a-21: las dang po pas shes par bya ba'i phyir las kyi rim pa bri ba'o //
T02D3773:176a-22: slob dpon gyis grags pa dang chags pas ma yin
T02D3773:176a-23: gyi ma rtogs pa'i gang zag la snying rje bas
T02D3773:176a-24: brtsams pa ni / snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas //
T02D3773:176a-25: 'gro ba ma lus don du ni //
T02D3773:176a-26: gtor ma chen po'i rim pa 'di //
T02D3773:176a-27: zhi ba'i rgyud kyi don bsdus yin //
T02D3773:176a-29: snying rje ni sems can la dmigs pa dang chos la dmigs pa'o //
T02D3773:176a-30: de la sems can sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba la snying rje ba dang /
T02D3773:176a-31: phyin ci log la yang dag tu 'dzin pa la snying rje ba ste go rims bzhin no //
T02D3773:176a-32: thams cad khyab pas chen po'o //
T02D3773:176a-33: 'gro ba ris drug ni lha dang lha ma yin
T02D3773:176a-34: dang mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dags dang dmyal
T02D3773:176a-35: ba ste spyi la gtong bas ma lus don to
T02D3773:176a-36: // chen po zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3773:176a-37: 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa ni zhi ba dang
T02D3773:176a-38: khro bo'i rgyud kyi rtog pa mang bas na zhi
T02D3773:176a-39: ba'i rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o //
T02D3773:176a-40: rgyud ni rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu'o //
T02D3773:176a-41: de la rgyud ni smin par byas pa dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3773:176a-42: thabs ni de kho na nyid bcu la sogs pa'o //
T02D3773:176b-1: gang zhig snying rje'i rlan sems kyis //
T02D3773:176b-2: bdag dang gzhan don sgrub 'dod pas //
T02D3773:176b-3: zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i gang zag gi mtshan nyid de /
T02D3773:176b-4: theg pa chen po la snying rje dang mi ldan
T02D3773:176b-5: pas mi 'grub pas rtsa ba ni snying rje chen
T02D3773:176b-7: bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa dang /
T02D3773:176b-8: sems can gyi don bya bar 'dod pas bla ma
T02D3773:176b-9: dam pa bsten par bya zhing rgyud kyi don btsal
T02D3773:176b-11: dang po mkhas la bslab par bya //
T02D3773:176b-13: dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i slob mas bla ma
T02D3773:176b-14: mkhas pa snying rje dang ldan pa mang du thos
T02D3773:176b-16: bla ma'i bka' dang mi 'gal bar spyad cing rgyud kyi dgongs pa btsal bar bya'o //
T02D3773:176b-17: lobs nas gtor ma'i rdzas bsogs te /
T02D3773:176b-18: rin chen snod mdzes chu gtsang dang //
T02D3773:176b-19: rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang //
T02D3773:176b-20: 'bru lnga dang ni snying po lnga //
T02D3773:176b-21: spos dang me tog mdzes pa lnga //
T02D3773:176b-22: dkar gsum mngar gsum phye 'am zan //
T02D3773:176b-23: 'bras la sogs pa'i chan khrol dang /
T02D3773:176b-24: khur ba la sogs gtsang ma'i zas //
T02D3773:176b-25: ji cam 'byor tsam bsham par bya //
T02D3773:176b-26: zhes bya ba ni bla ma mnyes par byas shing
T02D3773:176b-27: rgyud thos nas las kyi rim pa shes nas rin
T02D3773:176b-28: po che'i snod la sogs pa'i rdzas 'byor ba yongs
T02D3773:176b-29: su bsogs te / snod rin po che las byas
T02D3773:176b-30: pa bzo legs pa'i nang du chu ma 'bags pa
T02D3773:176b-31: mi gtsang ba la sogs pas sme bar ma gyur
T02D3773:176b-32: su bsogs te / pa dang / gser dang byu
T02D3773:176b-33: ru dang dngul dang mu tig dang shel la sogs
T02D3773:176b-34: pa rin po che sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D3773:176b-39: shve ta aa pa ra tsi ta la sogs pa'i sman thams cad dang /
T02D3773:176b-40: 'bras dang nas dang til dang gro dang ma sha sran ma sogs pa'i 'bru thams cad dang /
T02D3773:176b-41: tsha dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bu ram dang gser la sogs pa snying po thams cad dang /
T02D3773:176b-45: tu ru ska la sogs pa'i spos thams cad dang /
T02D3773:176b-50: aa shva ka la sogs pa me tog thams cad dang /
T02D3773:177a-1: la sogs pa 'bras bu rnams kyi chan dang /
T02D3773:177a-5: gzhan yang dri zhim zhing gtsang ma'i zas sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D3773:177a-6: phye dang zan ni gnyis ka dgos pa ma yin gyi yang na zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3773:177a-7: de yang rnam pa thams cad du dgos pa ma yin gyi nus tshad du 'byor tshad do //
T02D3773:177a-8: mi nus pa dang mi 'byor na ji lta bu
T02D3773:177a-9: snyam pa la de dag med na chu nyid la
T02D3773:177a-10: / rin chen sna 'ga' bdar la btang //
T02D3773:177a-12: 'ga' ni gcig tsam de las lhag pa'o //
T02D3773:177a-13: don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D3773:177a-14: 'byor tshad kyi rdzas yin gyi rgya chad pa ni ma yin no //
T02D3773:177a-15: ting nge 'dzin nam dngos su ni //
T02D3773:177a-16: rnam lnga'i mchod pa'ang mdun du gzhag / ces pa
T02D3773:177a-17: ni rnal 'byor rgyud la phyi rol gyi bya ba
T02D3773:177a-18: gtso bo ma yin pas so //
T02D3773:177a-19: rdzas dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag tu lus bde bar bya ba nas /
T02D3773:177a-20: de nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste zhes smos so //
T02D3773:177a-21: thams cad kyi don du snying rje 'gro bas na
T02D3773:177a-22: snying rje'i sems kyis mnyam par bzhag la zhes bshad
T02D3773:177a-23: do // mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ni tshogs
T02D3773:177a-24: rdzogs pas 'grub kyi gzhan du ma yin pas tshogs
T02D3773:177a-25: do // bsag dgos la / de la yang rten
T02D3773:177a-26: khyad par can dgos pas bde bar gshegs pa spyan
T02D3773:177a-27: drangs pa ni ting nge 'dzin kho nas 'grub pas
T02D3773:177a-28: do // bsag dgos la / / de nas rang snying pam pad dkar //
T02D3773:177a-29: de dkyil aa las zla dkyil 'khor //
T02D3773:177a-30: de dkyil dh'i:las ral grir gyur //
T02D3773:177a-32: bde gshegs sras bcas 'od kyi bkug / mdun gyi mkha' la gsal bar bsam //
T02D3773:177a-35: rang gi snying gar pam dkar po bsams la /
T02D3773:177a-36: de yongs su gyur pa las padma dkar po 'dab
T02D3773:177a-37: ma bzhi pa'i steng du aa dkar po gyur pa
T02D3773:177a-38: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams pa'i steng du /
T02D3773:177a-39: dh'i: dkar po gyur ba las ral gri'i chang pa la dh'i: dkar pos mtshan pa'o //
T02D3773:177a-40: thams cad du dkar po ni skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
T02D3773:177a-41: padma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa padma'i rigs so //
T02D3773:177a-42: zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D3773:177a-43: ral gri ni shes rab rno ba'o //
T02D3773:177a-44: dh'i: las 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs can gyis sangs
T02D3773:177b-0: rgyas @177b dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos
T02D3773:177b-1: thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsams
T02D3773:177b-2: la / phyag dang mchod pa la sogs pa rgyan
T02D3773:177b-3: dang ldan pas mchod pa dbul te spro bsdu gong
T02D3773:177b-4: la / dang 'dra'o // de yang phyogs bcu'i rgyal
T02D3773:177b-5: ba sras dang bcas pa la sems kyis sprul te
T02D3773:177b-7: yang snying ga'i dh'i: las ni mchod pa'i lha mo
T02D3773:177b-9: mchod pa dpag med dbul bar bya //
T02D3773:177b-11: bdag ni skye gnas thams cad du //
T02D3773:177b-12: zhes bya ba ni skye gnas bzhi'o //
T02D3773:177b-13: mngal dang drod gsher dang sgo nga dang rdzus pa
T02D3773:177b-14: las skyes pa thog ma med pa nas skye ba
T02D3773:177b-15: blangs pa kun du sdig pa srog gcod pa dang
T02D3773:177b-16: ; ma byin par blangs pa dang /
T02D3773:177b-17: mi tshangs par spyad pa dang /
T02D3773:177b-27: dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /
T02D3773:177b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag bton pa dang /
T02D3773:177b-29: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa thams cad rang gis byas pa dang /
T02D3773:177b-31: gzhan byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba byas pa thams cad bshags so //
T02D3773:177b-32: sdig pa bgyis pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3773:177b-34: bdag gi dge ba spel ba'i phyir gzhan dge ba
T02D3773:177b-35: byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba ni sangs
T02D3773:177b-36: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dge ba
T02D3773:177b-37: rgya chen po'i stobs kyis mchog bsgrub cing da ltar
T02D3773:177b-39: 'gro ba gya nom pa rnams dge ba rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
T02D3773:177b-40: phal pa rnams dge ba bag 'ga' byed pa la dga' ba'o //
T02D3773:177b-41: bde gshegs sras bcas bsam dag pa'i //
T02D3773:177b-42: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3773:177b-44: bsam dag ni nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dag pa'o //
T02D3773:177b-45: sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pas na mgon po'o //
T02D3773:177b-46: de nyid thugs rje chen po mnga' bas na sems
T02D3773:177b-47: can thams cad la snod kyi rim pa dang 'tsham
T02D3773:177b-48: pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig pa'o //
T02D3773:177b-49: ji snyed ces bya ba ni mtha' dag ces pa'i don to //
T02D3773:177b-50: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas ma lus pa zhes bya'o //
T02D3773:177b-51: sems can ma rig pa'i mun nag gi nang na
T02D3773:177b-52: gnas pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas gsal
T02D3773:178a-0: bar @178a * // mdzad cing bzhugs shig pa ni /
T02D3773:178a-1: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3773:178a-3: de ltar ma yin na skye shi med pa'i sku la grongs pa mi mnga'o //
T02D3773:178a-4: mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul ston pa ni rtag pa
T02D3773:178a-5: lta ba sun dbyung ba dang le lo can la
T02D3773:178a-6: phan phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3773:178a-7: bdag gi dge ba 'di dag gis /
T02D3773:178a-8: 'gro rnams thams cad myur rdzogs shog / ces bya
T02D3773:178a-9: ba ni sems can thams cad la bsngo ba dang
T02D3773:178a-10: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba thabs
T02D3773:178a-11: khyad par can yin pas so //
T02D3773:178a-12: aom badzra mu: zhes pa ni gong gi spyan drang ba rnams gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D3773:178a-13: gzhan dag ni rang gi snying gar bsdu bar 'dod do //
T02D3773:178a-14: de ni bdag la byin gyis rlob par dgongs pa'o //
T02D3773:178a-15: gshegs su gsol ba ni bsod nams bsags pas dgos pa grub par dgongs pa'o //
T02D3773:178a-16: da ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyi yan lag tu
T02D3773:178a-17: 'gyur ba byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ste
T02D3773:178a-18: / de yang smon pa dang 'jug pa'o //
T02D3773:178a-19: de la smon pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub dang /
T02D3773:178a-23: byang chub sems de mdor bsdu na //
T02D3773:178a-24: rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste //
T02D3773:178a-25: smon pa byang chub sems dang ni //
T02D3773:178a-26: 'jug pa byang chub sems nyid do//
T02D3773:178a-28: bye brag ji ltar shes pa ltar //
T02D3773:178a-29: de bzhin mkhas pas 'di gnyis kyi //
T02D3773:178a-30: bye brag rim bzhin shes par bya //
T02D3773:178a-32: de las kyang dang po kun rdzob byang chub kyi
T02D3773:178a-33: sems su gyur pa tshad med pa'i byams pa la
T02D3773:178a-34: sogs pa'o // sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir //
T02D3773:178a-35: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T02D3773:178a-37: tshad med pa ni tshad gzhal du med pa ste khams gsum pa thams cad la'o //
T02D3773:178a-38: de yang sems can thams cad la chos dang zang zing gi phan gdags pa dang /
T02D3773:178a-39: nad la sogs pa'i gnod pa zhi bar bya zhing nyon mongs pa spang bar bya ba dang /
T02D3773:178a-40: de ltar phan btags pa dang gnod pa spangs pas
T02D3773:178a-41: sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan zhing tshogs
T02D3773:178a-42: rdzogs pas de la dga' bar bya ba dang /
T02D3773:178a-43: dgra zun thams cad mnyam pa bsgoms bas na /
T02D3773:178a-44: de nas tshad med bzhi bsgom bya//
T02D3773:178b-1: pha rol gnod sel snying rje'o //
T02D3773:178b-2: sems can don grub dga' ba ni //
T02D3773:178b-3: de ni dga' ba tshad med yin //
T02D3773:178b-4: gzhan gyis gnod pa tshad med byed //
T02D3773:178b-5: de la mnyam gzhag btang snyoms so //
T02D3773:178b-7: de ltar tshad med bzhi rdzogs nas //
T02D3773:178b-8: de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin bsgom //
T02D3773:178b-9: zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyar ba ste //
T02D3773:178b-10: de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
T02D3773:178b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya
T02D3773:178b-12: rtsa brgyad bshad pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam
T02D3773:178b-13: grangs so // de nyid bshad pa na /
T02D3773:178b-14: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun ;
T02D3773:178b-15: / ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par stong //
T02D3773:178b-17: phyi ni ri dang khang pa la sogs pa sems kyi gnas yin pas snod ces bya'o //
T02D3773:178b-18: de thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
T02D3773:178b-19: ni stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid las ma
T02D3773:178b-20: 'das pa'o // de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las //
T02D3773:178b-21: de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
T02D3773:178b-22: phyi'i chos gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos rnams te /
T02D3773:178b-23: mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
T02D3773:178b-28: chos chos kyis stong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3773:178b-29: nang gi sems can du gtogs pa rnams te snod na yod pas bcud do //
T02D3773:178b-30: de yang stong pa nyid de /
T02D3773:178b-31: yang de nyid las nang gi chos mig dang /
T02D3773:178b-37: de yang mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir mig mig gis stong ngo //
T02D3773:178b-38: rna ba rna bas stong ngo //
T02D3773:178b-42: yid yid kyis stong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3773:178b-43: gzugs rnam par rtog pa ni gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'o //
T02D3773:178b-44: de thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa tsam ste phyi rol na med do //
T02D3773:178b-46: gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D3773:178b-47: gal te gzugs la sogs pa de dag yod na gcig pu zhig gam /
T02D3773:178b-48: du ma zhig ces de dang por bya'o //
T02D3773:178b-49: gal te gcig pu zhig yin na ni zin pa dang ma zin pa dang /
T02D3773:178b-50: rags pa dang phra ba dang dman pa dang gya nom pa'i cha tha dad pa mi 'thad do //
T02D3773:178b-51: du ma yang mi 'thad pa nyid de phra rab phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir ro //

T02D3773:179b-42: mya ngan las 'das pa yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu /
T02D3773:180a-0: @180a * // mya ngan las 'das pa las lhag pa'i chos zhig
T02D3773:180a-1: yod na yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta

T02D3773:180a-7: mnyam pa'i ngang ni sems kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //

T02D3773:180a-9: de nyid kyis na aom sva bh'a wa zhes pa

T02D3773:180b-0: // theg pa chen po nyid nas gtor ma la sogs pa @180b sbyin pa dang /

T02D3773:180b-14: du lus ngag gtso bor byed pas rmongs pa nyid

T02D3773:180b-16: thabs kyi dam pa lha dang mi bral bas thams
T02D3773:180b-18: bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis //

T02D3773:181a-0: @181a * // de'i phyir gzhag pa 'di ni mthun pa ma yin no //

T02D3773:181b-4: // 'bras bu lam du byed pa yin zhing tshe gcig la sogs pas 'grub pas lam nye ba'o //

T02D3773:181b-26: zhes bya ba ni de rjes bsam zhes 'brel te /

T02D3773:182a-28: de nas zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang grub nas so //

T02D3773:182a-30: dkyil gyi snying po ste gzhal yas khang gi snying po la bya'o //
T02D3773:182a-31: pam nyid gyur pa las padma 'dab ma bzhi pa
T02D3773:182a-32: kha dog ljang gu 'dab ma gnyis dang snying po
T02D3773:182a-33: la nyi ma 'dab ma gnyis la zla bas brgyan
T02D3773:182a-34: te gru gsum ni chos kyi dbyings so ;
T02D3773:182a-35: / padma ni nyes pas ma gos pa'o //
T02D3773:182a-36: nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa yin zhing zla ba byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D3773:182a-37: rten de lta bu dang ldan nas lha nyid sgom pa ni /
T02D3773:182a-38: de rjes dh'i:yi sgra byung bas //
T02D3773:182a-39: nyi ma'i dkyil du dh'i: dkar bsam //

T02D3773:182a-42: sgra la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //

T02D3773:182a-44: de yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dpal lo //
T02D3773:182a-45: mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D3773:182a-46: sku mdog dkar po g-yas na ral gri g-yon na glegs bam /
T02D3773:182b-0: gzhon nu'i @182b gzugs can zur phud lnga //
T02D3773:182b-1: phyag rgya lnga ldan bdag nyid bsam //
T02D3773:182b-4: mum las ae grags pa las /
T02D3773:182b-5: ae kha dog dkar po gru gsum gyi gzhal yas khang du /
T02D3773:182b-6: mum las pam grags pas padmar gyur pa'i dkyil du
T02D3773:182b-7: dh'i: gyur pa'i ral gri las 'jam dpal sku mdog
T02D3773:182b-9: phyag gnyis pa ral gri dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti bsnams pa /
T02D3773:182b-10: na tshod lo brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid can ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
T02D3773:182b-11: dbu rgyan rigs ldas mtshan pa phyag dang zhabs kyi
T02D3773:182b-12: le'u dang mgul rgyan dang sku'i se mo do la
T02D3773:182b-13: sogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i //
T02D3773:182b-14: mdun du ma yin pas bdag nyid ces pa'o //
T02D3773:182b-15: de la sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D3773:182b-16: dpral pa mgrin pa snying ga ru //
T02D3773:182b-17: go rims bzhin du aom a'a:h'um ni bsam bar bya //
T02D3773:182b-19: de nas nam mkha'i mum yig thams cad kyi 'byung
T02D3773:182b-20: gnas de bdag 'jam dpal gyi dbus su babs te
T02D3773:182b-21: gyur pa las ye shes sems dpar gyur par bsam
T02D3773:182b-23: de nas bdag gis tsa brjod pas //
T02D3773:182b-24: g-yas kyi pad 'dab zla dkyil du //
T02D3773:182b-25: lha mo skra can sku mdog dkar //
T02D3773:182b-26: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen g-yas /
T02D3773:182b-27: skyil krung phyad bcas rgyal mtshan g-yon //
T02D3773:182b-29: tsa zhes brjod pas zla ba'i steng du tsa byung
T02D3773:182b-30: nas de gyur pa las lha mo dkar mo ming
T02D3773:182b-31: skra can ma'o // g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pa'i skyil krung phyed do //
T02D3773:182b-32: skra ni tsha reg dang grang reg las skyob pas
T02D3773:182b-33: na de bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D3773:182b-34: kyi rnam rtog gi tsha grang las skyob pa'o //
T02D3773:182b-35: de rjes bdag gis ra brjod pas /
T02D3773:182b-36: mdun gyi pad 'dab nyi dkyil du //
T02D3773:182b-37: lha mo dra can sku mdog dmar //
T02D3773:182b-38: g-yas na ral gri g-yon bad sngon //
T02D3773:182b-39: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar du bzhugs //
T02D3773:182b-40: yang ni bdag gis pa brjod pas //
T02D3773:182b-41: rgyab kyi pad 'dab zla dkyil du //
T02D3773:182b-42: lha mo zla 'od sku mdog ser //
T02D3773:182b-43: skyil krung phyed bcas ral gri g-yas //
T02D3773:182b-44: autpal sngon po g-yon pa na //
T02D3773:182b-45: bdag gis na yi sgra brjod pas //
T02D3773:182b-46: g-yon gyi pad 'dab nyi dkyil du //
T02D3773:182b-47: nye ba'i skra can sku mdog ljang //
T02D3773:183a-2: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum stabs su bzhugs //
T02D3773:183a-3: zhes bya ba'i rjes ni phyi nas te lha mo dra can bskyed nas so //
T02D3773:183a-4: ral la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D3773:183a-5: mdun la sogs pa'ang ni go sla'o //
T02D3773:183a-6: dra ba can ni nyon mongs pa dang bral bas
T02D3773:183a-7: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te de yang nyon
T02D3773:183a-8: mongs 'phrog pas dra ba can te /
T02D3773:183a-9: nyon mongs phyed 'phrog dra phyed yin //
T02D3773:183a-11: de dang ldan pas dra ba can no //
T02D3773:183a-12: dmar ba ni sems can gyi don la chags pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-13: zla 'od ces bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D3773:183a-14: zla ba'i 'od thams cad la gsal zhing bsil ba
T02D3773:183a-15: ltar thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so
T02D3773:183a-16: // ser ba ni rin po che'i rigs sems can
T02D3773:183a-17: thams cad kyi tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar byed
T02D3773:183a-18: // pa'o // nye ba'i skra can ni bya ba
T02D3773:183a-19: grub pa'i ye shes te me long lta bu'i ye
T02D3773:183a-20: shes kyi shugs kyis byung bas nye ba'o //
T02D3773:183a-21: ljang gu kha dog sna tshogs zhes bya ste las thams cad pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-22: da ni de rnams kyi phyag mtshan bshad par bya ste /
T02D3773:183a-23: rin po che ni dgos 'dod sdod pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-24: rgyal mtshan ni chos mi nub pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-25: ral gri shes rab kyis thams cad gcod pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-26: padma sngon po ni 'gro ba'i don byas kyang nyes pas ma gos pa las mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D3773:183a-27: autpal ni thams cad phan 'dogs shing lan la re ba med pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-28: po ti ni chos kyi char 'bebs pa'o //
T02D3773:183a-29: lha mo bzhi po de rnams kyang phyag rgya dang
T02D3773:183a-30: ldan par bsam zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin
T02D3773:183a-31: no // rnal 'byor pa'i lus ni rgya mtsho'i gzings
T02D3773:183a-32: bzhin du bskyang bar bya ba yin na bsrung ba'i
T02D3773:183a-33: de kho na nyid ji lta bu snyam pa la
T02D3773:183a-34: bdag nyid 'jam dpal yin phyir dang /
T02D3773:183a-35: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs phyir //
T02D3773:183a-36: lus bsrung cho ga bya mi dgos //
T02D3773:183a-38: bdag 'jam dpal gyi rnal 'byor nyid bsrung ba'i cho ga yin pas /
T02D3773:183a-39: gzhan gyi bsrung ba la rag ma lus pa dang /
T02D3773:183a-40: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa yang bsrung ba mchog tu gyur pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3773:183a-41: tho rangs la sogs pa thog ma 'jug pa'i dus dang /
T02D3773:183a-42: gnas skabs gzhan gyi bya ba dang /
T02D3773:183a-43: mchod pa la sogs pa'i yan lag tu khrus dang
T02D3773:183a-44: phyogs dang dus dang skar ma dang rdzas rnams kyang
T02D3773:183a-45: rkyen du gyur pa yin na ci'i phyir ma bshad
T02D3773:183b-0: ce na / snying rje'i sems @183b kyis mnyam 'jog phyir //
T02D3773:183b-1: zhes bya ste gtan tshigs de'i phyir ro //
T02D3773:183b-2: de'i phyi rol kyi khrus dang phyogs dang dus dang
T02D3773:183b-3: skar ma dang rdzas kyi kha dog ni sogs pa
T02D3773:183b-5: de rnams kyi rtsol ba bya mi dgos te snying rje chen po dang /
T02D3773:183b-6: stong pa nyid dang lha'i rnal 'byor nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D3773:183b-8: khrus dang gtsang sgra 'dir mi dgos //
T02D3773:183b-9: dka' thub dka' spyad mi dgos te //
T02D3773:183b-10: sangs rgyas kun dang sems dpa' che //
T02D3773:183b-13: snying rje dang ldan na sdom pa gsum la gnas te /
T02D3773:183b-14: de yang khrus kyi cho ga yin pas na sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni //
T02D3773:183b-15: dang po khrus su bshad pa yin //
T02D3773:183b-17: byas pas nyes par 'gyur ram snyam pa la byas
T02D3773:183b-18: pa la yang nyes pa med de de lta bu
T02D3773:183b-19: la dga' ba dang rnal 'byor gyi rkyen du 'gyur
T02D3773:183b-21: rnam pa thams cad du dgos pa ma yin gyis bya ba ni yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3773:183b-22: de ltar lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bsgom pa dang /
T02D3773:183b-23: bsgoms pas dub na bzlas pa bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D3773:183b-24: bdag gi nang gi snying ga ru //
T02D3773:183b-25: mum yig 'od dang ldan pa bsam //

T02D3773:183b-30: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang ldan par bsam zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3773:183b-33: mngon pa theg pa che chung gi drug dang gsang sngags las bya ba gtso bo dang /

T02D3773:183b-35: lo skyon med par bskor bas dkar po rtsi bas
T02D3773:183b-36: brgyad pa'o // de'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D3773:183b-38: zhes bya ste mu khyud rim pa gnyis kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D3773:183b-39: de yang yig 'bru dgod pa ni phyi rol gyi mu khyud la k'a li zhes bya ste /
T02D3773:183b-49: mu khyud nang ma la ni a'a li zhes bya ste /
T02D3773:183b-50: aa a'a ai a'i au a'ur ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aom aa:/
T02D3773:184a-1: kyi lte ba ste 'khor lo'i snying po la aom
T02D3773:184a-2: bsam mo zhes pa ni gzhan 'dren pa ste 'khor
T02D3773:184a-5: aa ra pa tsa na dh'i: dang /
T02D3773:184a-6: mthar ni sv'a h'a yod pa rnams zhes bya ste dang ni sv'a h'a bsdu'o //
T02D3773:184a-7: snying po las mthar gyur pa ni rtsi bas nyid do //
T02D3773:184a-8: kha cig ni sv'a h'i mtha' can zhes bya bar 'dod do //
T02D3773:184a-10: aa ra pa tsa na dh'i:sv'a h'a brgyad rtsi bas re la yig 'bru re dgod pa'o //
T02D3773:184a-12: rtsibs brgyad la ni klag phyogs su //

T02D3773:184a-15: klag phyogs ni mdun nas g-yas phyogs nas phar rim pas so //
T02D3773:184a-16: rim gyis bri ba ni gsal bar bsam pa'o //

T02D3773:184a-18: bstod pa byas la bsgom par bya'o //

T02D3773:184a-20: aom aa ra pa tsa na dh'i:sv'a h'a zhes bzlas so //

T02D3773:184a-24: mnyam par bzhag la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang

T02D3773:184a-26: dor legs par byas par me tog tshom bur dgram
T02D3773:184a-27: pa dang / sngar bshad pa'i gtor ma bsham pa 'am /
T02D3773:184a-28: yang gtor ma ma bshams pa yang rung ste sngar
T02D3773:184a-29: bshad pa'i yan lag bdun pa la sogs pa byas
T02D3773:184a-30: pa ste tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang /
T02D3773:184a-31: yang na yan lag bcu gcig pa bya ste /
T02D3773:184a-32: phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D3773:184a-33: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D3773:184a-34: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3773:184a-35: bdug pa me tog mar me sogs //
T02D3773:184a-36: dngos su bshams dang sprul pas mchod //
T02D3773:184a-37: bdag gi skye gnas thams cad du //
T02D3773:184a-38: sdig pa ci bgyis thams cad bshags //
T02D3773:184a-39: bde gshegs sras bcas bsam dag pa'i //
T02D3773:184a-40: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //

T02D3773:184a-42: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
T02D3773:184a-43: ji snyed sangs rgyas ma lus pa //
T02D3773:184a-44: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3773:184a-45: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu //
T02D3773:184b-0: dus 'di phan chad sems @184b bskyed bgyi //
T02D3773:184b-1: mgon po rnams la lus 'di dbul //
T02D3773:184b-2: thugs la bzhes shing dngos grub stsol //
T02D3773:184b-3: bdag gi dge ba de dag gis //
T02D3773:184b-4: 'gro rnams thams cad myur rdzogs shog / so sor thar dang byang chub sems //
T02D3773:184b-5: rig 'dzin sdom la gnas par bgyi //
T02D3773:184b-6: zhes brjod la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3773:184b-7: de nas tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pa nas
T02D3773:184b-8: snying gar 'khor lo bsgom pa'i bar du snga ma
T02D3773:184b-10: lte ba'i aom las 'od 'phros pas ye shes sems
T02D3773:184b-11: dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa rnam pa lnga la

T02D3773:184b-13: bsgom pa'o // de nas skyo bar gyur na mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D3773:184b-15: de las aom las 'od zer ni //
T02D3773:184b-16: lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'phros yi dam lha //
T02D3773:184b-17: 'khor bcas bkug nas nam mkhar bsam //
T02D3773:184b-19: snying ga'i aom las 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'dra
T02D3773:184b-20: ba 'phros pas yi dam gyi lha 'jam dpal 'khor
T02D3773:184b-21: lha mo bzhis bskor ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan
T02D3773:184b-22: drangs la mdun du bzhugs su gsol ba'o //

T02D3773:184b-24: ho: zhes brjod pas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang
T02D3773:184b-25: bcing ba dang dbang du bya bas gnyis su med
T02D3773:184b-26: par bsgom mo // bzlas pa gtso bor byed na mdun nyid du'o //
T02D3773:184b-27: de nyid mchod par 'dod pas de la dngos sam ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02D3773:184b-28: phyag dang mchod pa dbul bar bya //
T02D3773:184b-30: snyan sngags dang bcas pa'i phyag byas pas bdag gi
T02D3773:184b-31: snying ga'i aom las lus mdzes pa rgyan dang ldan
T02D3773:184b-32: pa grangs med pas phyag byas par bsam pa dang
T02D3773:184b-33: / yang de nyid du thim par bsam pa la
T02D3773:184b-34: lha mo dpag tu med pa yang aom las 'phros

T02D3773:184b-36: / lo // de nas yang aom nyid la thim pa'o //
T02D3773:184b-37: dngos su ma 'byor na ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang dbul lo //
T02D3773:184b-38: mdun gyi lha rnams gsal bsams la //
T02D3773:184b-39: rang gi snying ga'i sngags gsal bar //

T02D3773:184b-41: rang gi snying ga'i sngags ni aom dang rtsibs brgyad kyi yi ge'o //
T02D3773:184b-42: mdun gyi lha ni 'jam dpal 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3773:184b-43: de thams cad gsal bar bsgom zhing bzlas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D3773:184b-45: bzlas pa yi ni mchod pa 'di //
T02D3773:185a-2: 'od las lha mo mang spros te //
T02D3773:185a-3: mdun gyi lha rnams mchod bsam zhing //
T02D3773:185a-4: lha mo nyid kyang der thim par //
T02D3773:185a-6: bzlas pa byas pas snying ga'i yig 'bru las 'od
T02D3773:185a-7: 'phros pas lha mor gyur nas mchod pa phul nas
T02D3773:185a-8: slar 'dus pa'o // brgya rtsa brgyad kyi grangs su bya //
T02D3773:185a-9: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa tsam du zad kyi nges pa kho na ma yin no //

T02D3773:185a-11: ga'i yig 'bru kho na gsal bar bya zhing bzlas
T02D3773:185a-12: la / bzlas brjod gtso bor byed pas mdun gyi
T02D3773:185a-13: lha dang sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu gsal bar

T02D3773:185a-16: la / bya'o // bar gsungs so // de nas yang skyo bar gyur na mchod pa 'bul /
T02D3773:185a-17: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i chus mchod
T02D3773:185a-18: pa'i yan lag rnams bsangs la aom badzra dh'u pe
T02D3773:185a-19: h'um zhes spos byin gyis brlab /

T02D3773:185a-22: zhes me tog dang mar me dang dri chab byin
T02D3773:185a-23: gyis brlabs te / de rnams rang rang gi lha mor ro //

T02D3773:185a-25: a'adya nu tpanna tv'ad ces pa lha'i zhal zas ro

T02D3773:185a-34: me gha sa mu dra spar na sa ma ye
